title: Oldest U.S. polar bear 'Klondike' dies at age 34
text:
Published By: Reuters - Environment - Today 
(Reuters) - The oldest polar bear living in the United States died at age 34 on Friday at its home in the Philadelphia Zoo, zoo officials sa...
